title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. G, pt. 54 - Exemption Certificates
content:

State Regulations
§ 54.1 - General
§ 54.2 - Records to be maintained by out-of-state brokers and dealers in securities

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. G, pt. 54

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171; art. 12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
